entry.title: Daily Update - 26.05
entry.content:
Days without job: 26

Cover letters and CV sent to: Autodesk (no remote positions, will be dropped with 95% chance, but hope dies last), Bark.com, Datastax (I hate Jobvite CV submit form - it not allow to post PDF files! In 2015, CARL!), Imgur (i love it, but did not expect too much - no remote positions, so my application in 95% chance will be dropped), Automattic (former WordPress developer), Kissmetrics, Buffer.com

First letter received: Eyeo.com (Developer of AdBlockPlus, requested some info about my JS/Python/OSS background. Seems like HR manager didn’t open my CV at all. So I described a little my experience and now I hope this letter will be useful).

On Hold: CurrencyFair, Gravity4 (responded with denial to my CV, but this stuff so damn hot, so I founded this company on Angels list and try one more time)
